             <div class="center">

         </svg>
        </a>
        <a class="" href="/vpn/vpn-for-android/">
         <svg fill="none" height="20" viewbox="0 0 20 20" width="20" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">

        <a class="" href="/vpn/vpn-for-chrome/">

      </p>
     </div>
    </section>
   </div>

   function getOS(){var n=window.navigator.userAgent,i=window.navigator.platform,d=["Win32","Win64","Windows","WinCE"],o=["iPhone","iPad","iPod"],t=null;return-1!==["Macintosh","MacIntel","MacPPC","Mac68K"].indexOf(i)?t="Mac":-1!==o.indexOf(i)?t="iOs":-1!==d.indexOf(i)?t="Windows":/Android/.test(n)?t="Android":!t&&/Linux/.test(i)&&(t="Linux"),t}document.body.classList.add("os__"+getOS())
  </script>
